title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Texans firing head coach David Culley after only one season and what this says about the NFL as a whole for head coaches. He looks at the Wild Card match ups to open up the NFL playoffs and why we should except at least one upset. He shares his final Blazing 5 of the season for the NFL playoffs. Plus, 3-time Super Bowl champion Eric Mangini joins the show to explain why the Steelers will take down the Chiefs in the biggest upset of the weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
